hooks.name: ADMINPASSWORD
hooks.description: Admin password for first setup; updates INI_Password if changed.

hooks.name: DISABLE_ANTICHEAT
hooks.description: Disable AntiCheatProtectionType entries by index or ranges.

hooks.name: MOD_IDS
hooks.description: Mod IDs for the server; replaces INI_Mods.

hooks.name: SERVERPRESET
hooks.description: Preset name for SandboxVars; copies preset on first run or when SERVERPRESETREPLACE is true.

hooks.name: WORKSHOP_IDS
hooks.description: Workshop IDs and collections; replaces INI_WorkshopItems.

vars.name: ADMINPASSWORD_FILE
vars.description: Path to a file containing the admin password.

vars.name: CLEAN_WORKSHOP_ALLOW_REMOVE_ALL
vars.description: Allow cleanup to remove all items if none match.

vars.name: CLEAN_WORKSHOP_DRY_RUN
vars.description: List items that would be removed during workshop cleanup.

vars.name: CLEAN_WORKSHOP_KEEP_FILE
vars.description: Write resolved workshop IDs to this file.

vars.name: PASSWORD_FILE
vars.description: Path to a file containing the server password.

vars.name: RCONPASSWORD_FILE
vars.description: Path to a file containing the RCON password.

vars.name: SERVERPRESETREPLACE
vars.description: Replace existing SandboxVars with preset when true.

vars.name: STEAMAPPBRANCH
vars.description: Steam branch to install/update (e.g., stable, unstable).

vars.name: STEAM_API_KEY
vars.description: Steam Web API key for resolving collections.

INI.name: Removal happens when map chunks are loaded.

ini__pzserver__BloodSplatLifespanDays.name: Zero means they will never disappear\nMinimum=0 Maximum=365 Default=0

ini__pzserver__MaxPlayers.name: WARNING: Server player counts above 32 will potentially result in poor map streaming and desync. Please advance with caution.\nMinimum=1 Maximum=100 Default=32

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AdminSafehouse
pzserver.description: Only admins can claim safehouses

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AllowCoop
pzserver.description: Allow co-op/splitscreen players

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AllowDestructionBySledgehammer
pzserver.description: Allow players to destroy world objects with sledgehammers

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AllowNonAsciiUsername
pzserver.description: Allow use of non-ASCII (cyrillic etc) characters in usernames

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AnnounceDeath
pzserver.description: If checked, every time a player dies a global message will be displayed in the chat

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType1
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 1.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType10
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 10.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType11
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 11.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType12
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 12.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType13
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 13.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType14
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 14.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType15
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 15.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType15ThresholdMultiplier
pzserver.description: Threshold value multiplier for anti-cheat protection: type 15.\nMinimum=1.00 Maximum=10.00 Default=1.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType16
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 16.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType17
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 17.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType18
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 18.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType19
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 19.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType2
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 2.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType20
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 20.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType20ThresholdMultiplier
pzserver.description: Threshold value multiplier for anti-cheat protection: type 20.\nMinimum=1.00 Maximum=10.00 Default=1.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType22ThresholdMultiplier
pzserver.description: Minimum=1.00 Maximum=10.00 Default=1.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType24ThresholdMultiplier
pzserver.description: Minimum=1.00 Maximum=10.00 Default=6.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType2ThresholdMultiplier
pzserver.description: Threshold value multiplier for anti-cheat protection: type 2.\nMinimum=1.00 Maximum=10.00 Default=3.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType3
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 3.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType3ThresholdMultiplier
pzserver.description: Threshold value multiplier for anti-cheat protection: type 3.\nMinimum=1.00 Maximum=10.00 Default=1.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType4
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 4.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType4ThresholdMultiplier
pzserver.description: Threshold value multiplier for anti-cheat protection: type 4.\nMinimum=1.00 Maximum=10.00 Default=1.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType5
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 5.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType6
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 6.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType7
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 7.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType8
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 8.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType9
pzserver.description: Disables anti-cheat protection for type 9.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AntiCheatProtectionType9ThresholdMultiplier
pzserver.description: Threshold value multiplier for anti-cheat protection: type 9.\nMinimum=1.00 Maximum=10.00 Default=1.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__AutoCreateUserInWhiteList
pzserver.description: Add unknown usernames to the whitelist when players join. Clients will supply their own username/password on joining. (This is for Open=true servers)

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__BackupsCount
pzserver.description: Minimum=1 Maximum=300 Default=5

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__BackupsPeriod
pzserver.description: Minimum=0 Maximum=1500 Default=0

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__BloodSplatLifespanDays
pzserver.description: Number of days before old blood splats are removed.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__CarEngineAttractionModifier
pzserver.description: Modify the range of zombie attraction to cars. (Lower values can help with lag.)\nMinimum=0.00 Maximum=10.00 Default=0.50

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__ClientActionLogs
pzserver.description: ISExitVehicle;ISTakeEngineParts;

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__ClientCommandFilter
pzserver.description: +vehicle.damageWindow;+vehicle.fixPart;+vehicle.installPart;+vehicle.uninstallPart

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__ConstructionPreventsLootRespawn
pzserver.description: Items will not respawn in buildings that players have barricaded or built in

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DefaultPort
pzserver.description: Default starting port for player data. If UDP, this is this one of two ports used.\nMinimum=0 Maximum=65535 Default=16261

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DisableRadioAdmin
pzserver.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'admin' access level

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DisableRadioGM
pzserver.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'gm' access level

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DisableRadioInvisible
pzserver.description: Disables radio transmissions from invisible players

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DisableRadioModerator
pzserver.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'moderator' access level

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DisableRadioOverseer
pzserver.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'overseer' access level

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DisableRadioStaff
pzserver.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with an access level

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DisableSafehouseWhenPlayerConnected
pzserver.description: Safehouse acts like a normal house if a member of the safehouse is connected (so secure when players are offline)

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DiscordChannel
pzserver.description: The Discord channel name. (Try the separate channel ID option if having difficulties)

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DiscordChannelID
pzserver.description: The Discord channel ID. (Use if having difficulties with Discord channel name option)

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DiscordEnable
pzserver.description: Enables global text chat integration with a Discord channel

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DiscordToken
pzserver.description: Discord bot access token

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DisplayUserName
pzserver.description: Display usernames above player's heads in-game.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DoLuaChecksum
pzserver.description: Kick clients whose game files don't match the server's.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__DropOffWhiteListAfterDeath
pzserver.description: Remove player accounts from the whitelist after death. This prevents players creating a new character after death on Open=false servers

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__Faction
pzserver.description: Players can create factions when true

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__FactionDaySurvivedToCreate
pzserver.description: Players must survive this number of in-game days before being allowed to create a faction\nMinimum=0 Maximum=2147483647 Default=0

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__FactionPlayersRequiredForTag
pzserver.description: Number of players required as faction members before the faction owner can create a group tag\nMinimum=1 Maximum=2147483647 Default=1

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__FastForwardMultiplier
pzserver.description: Governs how fast time passes while players sleep. Value multiplies the speed of the time that passes during sleeping.\nMinimum=1.00 Maximum=100.00 Default=40.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__GlobalChat
pzserver.description: Toggles global chat on or off.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__HidePlayersBehindYou
pzserver.description: If true, automatically hide the player you can't see (like zombies).

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__HoursForLootRespawn
pzserver.description: After X hours, all containers in the world will respawn loot. To spawn loot a container must have been looted at least once. Loot respawn is not impacted by visibility or subsequent looting.\nMinimum=0 Maximum=2147483647 Default=0

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__ItemNumbersLimitPerContainer
pzserver.description: Maximum number of items that can be placed in a container.  Zero means there is no limit. (PLEASE NOTE: This includes individual small items such as nails. A limit of 50 will mean only 50 nails can be stored.)\nMinimum=0 Maximum=9000 Default=0

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__KickFastPlayers
pzserver.description: Kick players that appear to be moving faster than is possible. May be buggy -- use with caution.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__LoginQueueConnectTimeout
pzserver.description: Minimum=20 Maximum=1200 Default=60

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__Map
pzserver.description: Enter the foldername of the mod found in \Steam\steamapps\workshop\modID\mods\modName\media\maps\

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__MapRemotePlayerVisibility
pzserver.description: Controls display of remote players on the in-game map.\n1=Hidden 2=Friends 3=Everyone\nMinimum=1 Maximum=3 Default=1

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__MaxAccountsPerUser
pzserver.description: Limits the number of different accounts a single Steam user may create on this server. Ignored when using the Hosts button.\nMinimum=0 Maximum=2147483647 Default=0

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__MaxItemsForLootRespawn
pzserver.description: Containers with a number of items greater, or equal to, this setting will not respawn\nMinimum=1 Maximum=2147483647 Default=4

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__MaxPlayers
pzserver.description: Maximum number of players that can be on the server at one time. This excludes admins.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__MinutesPerPage
pzserver.description: The number of in-game minutes it takes to read one page of a book\nMinimum=0.00 Maximum=60.00 Default=1.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__Mods
pzserver.description: Enter the mod loading ID here. It can be found in \Steam\steamapps\workshop\modID\mods\modName\info.txt

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__MouseOverToSeeDisplayName
pzserver.description: If true, players will have to mouse over someone to see their display name.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__NoFire
pzserver.description: All forms of fire are disabled - except for campfires

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__Open
pzserver.description: Clients may join without already having an account in the whitelist. If set to false, administrators must manually create username/password combos.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PVP
pzserver.description: Players can hurt and kill other players

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PVPFirearmDamageModifier
pzserver.description: Damage multiplier for PVP ranged attacks.\nMinimum=0.00 Maximum=500.00 Default=50.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PVPMeleeDamageModifier
pzserver.description: Damage multiplier for PVP melee attacks.\nMinimum=0.00 Maximum=500.00 Default=30.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PVPMeleeWhileHitReaction
pzserver.description: If true, player can hit again when struck by another player.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__Password
pzserver.description: Clients must know this password to join the server. (Ignored when hosting a server via the Host button)

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PauseEmpty
pzserver.description: Game time stops when there are no players online

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PerkLogs
pzserver.description: Track changes in player perk levels in PerkLog.txt server log

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PingLimit
pzserver.description: Ping limit, in milliseconds, before a player is kicked from the server. (Set to 100 to disable)\nMinimum=100 Maximum=2147483647 Default=400

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PlayerBumpPlayer
pzserver.description: Governs whether players bump (and knock over) other players when running through them.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PlayerRespawnWithOther
pzserver.description: Players can respawn in-game at a split screen / Remote Play player's location

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PlayerRespawnWithSelf
pzserver.description: Players can respawn in-game at the coordinates where they died

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PlayerSafehouse
pzserver.description: Both admins and players can claim safehouses

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__Public
pzserver.description: Shows the server on the in-game browser. (Note: Steam-enabled servers are always visible in the Steam server browser)

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PublicDescription
pzserver.description: Description displayed in the in-game public server browser. Typing \n will create a new line in your description

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__PublicName
pzserver.description: Name of the server displayed in the in-game browser and, if applicable, the Steam browser

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__RCONPassword
pzserver.description: RCON password (Pick a strong password)

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__RCONPort
pzserver.description: The port for the RCON (Remote Console)\nMinimum=0 Maximum=65535 Default=27015

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__RemovePlayerCorpsesOnCorpseRemoval
pzserver.description: If enabled, when HoursForCorpseRemoval triggers, it will also remove player?s corpses from the ground.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__ResetID
pzserver.description: Reset ID determines if the server has undergone a soft-reset. If this number does match the client, the client must create a new character. Used in conjunction with PlayerServerID. It is strongly advised that you backup these IDs somewhere\nMinimum=0 Maximum=2147483647 Default=701341154

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SafeHouseRemovalTime
pzserver.description: Players are automatically removed from a safehouse they have not visited for this many real-world hours\nMinimum=0 Maximum=2147483647 Default=144

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SafehouseAllowFire
pzserver.description: Allow fire to damage safehouses

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SafehouseAllowLoot
pzserver.description: Allow non-members to take items from safehouses

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SafehouseAllowNonResidential
pzserver.description: Governs whether players can claim non-residential buildings.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SafehouseAllowRespawn
pzserver.description: Players will respawn in a safehouse that they were a member of before they died

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SafehouseAllowTrepass
pzserver.description: Allow non-members to enter a safehouse without being invited

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SafehouseDaySurvivedToClaim
pzserver.description: Players must have survived this number of in-game days before they are allowed to claim a safehouse\nMinimum=0 Maximum=2147483647 Default=0

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SafetyCooldownTimer
pzserver.description: The delay before a player can enter or leave PVP mode again, having recently done so\nMinimum=0 Maximum=1000 Default=3

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SafetySystem
pzserver.description: Players can enter and leave PVP on an individual basis. A player can only hurt another player when at least one of them is in PVP mode - as shown by the unobscured skull and crossbones on the left of the screen. When SafetySystem=false, players are free to hurt each other at any time if PVP is enabled.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SafetyToggleTimer
pzserver.description: The time it takes for a player to enter and leave PVP mode\nMinimum=0 Maximum=1000 Default=2

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SaveWorldEveryMinutes
pzserver.description: Loaded parts of the map are saved after this set number of real-world minutes have passed. (The map is usually saved only after clients leave a loaded area)\nMinimum=0 Maximum=2147483647 Default=0

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__ServerPlayerID
pzserver.description: ServerPlayerID determines if a character is from another server, or single player. This value may be changed by soft resets. If this number does match the client, the client must create a new character. This is used in conjunction with ResetID. It is strongly advised that you backup these IDs somewhere

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__ServerWelcomeMessage
pzserver.description: The first welcome message visible in the chat panel. This will be displayed immediately after player login. you can use RGB colours to chance the colour of the welcome message. You can also use <LINE> to create a separate lines within your text. Use: <RGB:1,0,0> This message will show up red!

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__ShowFirstAndLastName
pzserver.description: Display first & last name above player's heads.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__ShowSafety
pzserver.description: Display a skull icon over the head of players who have entered PVP mode

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SledgehammerOnlyInSafehouse
pzserver.description: Allow players to destroy world objects only in their safehouse (require AllowDestructionBySledgehammer to true).

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SleepAllowed
pzserver.description: Players are allowed to sleep when their survivor becomes tired, but they do not NEED to sleep

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SleepNeeded
pzserver.description: Players get tired and need to sleep. (Ignored if SleepAllowed=false)

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SpawnItems
pzserver.description: Item types new players spawn with.\nSeparate multiple item types with commas.\nExample: Base.Axe,Base.Bag_BigHikingBag

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SpawnPoint
pzserver.description: Force every new player to spawn at these set x,y,z world coordinates. Find desired coordinates at map.projectzomboid.com. (Ignored when 0,0,0)

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SpeedLimit
pzserver.description: Minimum=10.00 Maximum=150.00 Default=70.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SteamScoreboard
pzserver.description: Show Steam usernames and avatars in the Players list. Can be true (visible to everyone), false (visible to no one), or admin (visible to only admins)

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__SteamVAC
pzserver.description: Enable the Steam VAC system

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__TrashDeleteAll
pzserver.description: If true, player can use the "delete all" button on bins.

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__UDPPort
pzserver.description: Minimum=0 Maximum=65535 Default=16262

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__UPnP
pzserver.description: Attempt to configure a UPnP-enabled internet gateway to automatically setup port forwarding rules. The server will fall back to default ports if this fails

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__Voice3D
pzserver.description: Toggle directional audio for VOIP

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__VoiceEnable
pzserver.description: VOIP is enabled when checked

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__VoiceMaxDistance
pzserver.description: The maximum tile distance over which VOIP sounds can be heard.\nMinimum=0.00 Maximum=100000.00 Default=100.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__VoiceMinDistance
pzserver.description: The minimum tile distance over which VOIP sounds can be heard.\nMinimum=0.00 Maximum=100000.00 Default=10.00

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__WorkshopItems
pzserver.description: List Workshop Mod IDs for the server to download. Each must be separated by a semicolon. Example: WorkshopItems=514427485;513111049

pzserver.name: ini__pzserver__server_browser_announced_ip
pzserver.description: Set the IP from which the server is broadcast. This is for network configurations with multiple IP addresses, such as server farms
